mapper.select: select cu.cust_source,cu.cust_industry,cu.cust_level, follow.cust_status,follow.business_status,follow.cust_property FROM (SELECT b.item_name cust_source,c.item_name cust_industry,d.item_name cust_level FROM customer a LEFT JOIN (select id,item_name from base_dict where type_code="002" )b ON b.id = a.cust_source LEFT JOIN (select id,item_name from base_dict where type_code="001" )c ON c.id = a.cust_industry LEFT JOIN (select id,item_name from base_dict where type_code="006" )d ON d.id = a.cust_level WHERE a.cust_id = #{cust_id} ) cu, (SELECT IFNULL(f.item_name,"无") cust_status,IFNULL(g.item_name,"无") business_status,IFNULL(h.item_name,"无") cust_property,count(*) FROM follow_status e LEFT JOIN (select id,item_name from base_dict where type_code="005" )f ON f.id = e.cust_status LEFT JOIN (select id,item_name from base_dict where type_code="007" )g ON g.id = e.business_status LEFT JOIN (select id,item_name from base_dict where type_code="003" )h ON h.id = e.cust_property WHERE e.cust_id = #{cust_id} ) follow

SELECT SUM(money) money,COUNT(*) contractNum FROM contract WHERE cust_id = #{cust_id}
and start_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{start_time},"%Y-%m-01") and DATE_FORMAT(#{end_time},"%Y-%m-01")
